articles.content:
A row has broken out after Michael Sheen criticised King Charles III for visiting Cardiff on the same day as a medieval tradition celebrating the last native Prince of Wales.

articles.title: Queen Consort pays tribute to the late Queen - Sky News
articles.description: The Queen Consort has recorded a personal tribute to the late Queen, recalling her "wonderful blue eyes" and saying: "I will always remember her smile."#quee...

articles.title: Lady Gaga is forced to end Miami concert due to lightning striking down mid-performance - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lady Gaga was forced to stop her concert mid-performance due to a tropical storm that was causing lightning to strike down too close to the venue, causing safety concerns.
articles.content:
Lady Gaga emotionally revealed that her Chromatica Ball concert held in Miami Saturday evening had to come to a halting stop due to a severe tropical storm.
